name: 陳盛有
objective:
1.複數
2.複函數
3.諧和函數
4.複數積分
5.柯西積分理論
6.複冪級數
7.洛冉級數,餘數
8.保角寫像
schedule:
1.　　Complex Numbers
2.　　Moduli
3.　　Roots of Complex Numbers
4.　　Analytic Functions
5.　　Cauchy-Riemann Equations
6.　　The Logarithmic Function
7.　　Complex Exponents
8.　　Contour Integrals
9.　　Midterm Exam.
10.　　Cauchy-Goursat Theorem
11.　　Cauchy Integral Formula
12.　　Taylor Series
13.　　Laurent Series
14.　　Cauchy’s Residue Theorem
15.　　The Three Types of Isolated Singular Points
16.　　Evaluation of Improper Integrals
17.　　Definite Integrals involving Sines and Cosines
18.　　Final Exam.
materials: Complex Variables and Applications 8th , Brown , Churehill
